long_description: Take your work bench with you for trackside tune-ups with this portable Swix waxing table. The single adjustment leg lets you level the table on uneven surfaces. Sturdy table top measures 47 x 13.8 inches. Fold-up design stores flat for transport. Also great for use in your home workshop. Add a Swix waxing profile or vises (not included) to the table to complete your waxing setup.
short_description: Take your work bench with you for trackside tune-ups with this portable Swix waxing table. The single adjustment leg lets you level the table on uneven surfaces.
